field.label: Name
field.help: Choose a name for this mailer configuration.

field.label: Description
field.help: Choose a optional description for this mailer configuration.

field.label: Mail Servers
field.help: Add mailservers to this mailer configuration, i.e. 192.168.1.1:25. Use TAB key to complete typing.
field.hint: Enter ip:port here. Finish with TAB.

field.label: Mail Sender
field.help: Declare the from email address to be used in both the envelope and header of email alerts.

field.label: Mail Recipient
field.help: Declare both the recipient address in the envelope and to address in the header of email alerts.

field.label: Alert Log Level
field.help: Declare the maximum log level of messages for which email alerts will be sent. This acts as a filter on the sending of email alerts.

field.label: Timeout
field.help: Defines the time (in seconds) available for a mail/connection to be made and send to the mail server.

field.label: Hostname
field.help: Declare the to hostname address to be used when communicating with mailers.
